title: SUNWAYFOTO PF-XT4 Hand Grip Quick Release Plate L Bracket for Fujifilm X-T4 Compatible Arca Swiss
features: Custom made for a perfect fit with the Fujifilm XT-4 camera with seamless connection, without interference with battery replacement;
Lightweight wooden grip provides better hand feel in use being also corrosion-resistant and friction-resistant. Safer in holding the camera for vertical shooting.
Added protective silicone pad at the base, effectively protects the camera from scratches immobilizing it further.
Base QR plate is made of T6061 grade aluminum, Arca-Swiss Standard dovetail structure, compatible with Arca-Swiss, RRS, SUNWAYFOTO, SIRUI, BENRO tripods.
Stop pin, camera screw and raised lip act together to immobilize camera completely, avoiding shifting for higher quality photos and videos.
description: Sunwayfoto PF-XT4 is one battery grip specially designed for Fujifilm XT-4 camera, made of wood and aluminum material, which effectively enhance good grip of the camera. Base Arca-Swiss standard dovetail structure, this grip can be mounted on tripod directly;  The PF-XT4 is ideal for better grip and safety in shooting
